text: 16|38|(napiye!) Irantavarkalukku allah uyir kotuttu eluppa mattan enru innirakarippavarkal allahvin mite mikka urutiyana cattiyam ceytu kurukinranar. Appati illai; (‘‘unkalai uyirkotuttu eluppuvan'' enru) nan kuriya vakku murrilum unmaiyanate! Eninum, manitarkalil perumpalanavarkal (itai) arintukolla mattarkal
